Maybe try installing an older version of adobe air? http://helpx.adobe.com/air/kb/archived-air-sdk-version.html I didn't need to update mine, maybe the new one screws the game up.

Also, check your current adobe air version with help  from this link http://helpx.adobe.com/air/kb/determine-version-air-runtime.html My "Adobe AIR.dll" file version is 1.5.0.7220 and the game works fine

oh, nevermind! the game has a mute button. if you press the O key, it mutes the game. all fixed now. i kinda slapped myself for my stupidity there... then again, it is 9 AM. and sorry for the 3 comments.
